DOC.detailed_description: From practice commit implement EHR early 2005 , randomly select 15 adult community-based primary care physician . We select 15 similar physician practice plan adopt time period . At physician ' practice document rate medication error one week prior implementation EHR use duplicate prescription pad . Two month implementation adopt group , allow time familiarization tool , collect two week data use computer-based information ( adopt arm ) duplicate prescription ( non-adopting arm ) .
